dict.string:
Gives you the progress of a value inside of a structure of stops. For example, if the value was 200, and the stops were 100, 150, and 250, this would output 1.5.
Origami http://origami.facebook.com/
Use of this patch is subject to the license found at http://origami.facebook.com/license/
Copyright: (c) 2013-2015, Facebook, Inc. All rights reserved.
Created by: Brandon Walkin
A structure of stops to compare against the input value.
The progress of the value in the range of 0 to the number of stops minus one.
